title: General Form of a Cosine Function
text: To determine the final equation, we first need to identify each value in the general form of the sinusoidal function, which is $$Asin(B(x-C))$$ + D.

title: Finding the amplitude
text: Amplitude is |max value - min value|/2. What is the amplitude of this graph?

title: Finding the period
text: To find the period, find the $$x-difference$$ between two troughs or two crests (one full cycle of the graph). What is it?

title: Finding vertical shift
text: The vertical shift will be at the midline value, which is the value in the middle of the range of the function. This can be calculated as min value + |A|. What is the vertical shift?
